alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Fannin; Gilmer; Lumpkin; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lumpkin, southeastern Gilmer, northwestern Dawson, southwestern Union and southeastern Fannin Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Dial, or 12 miles southeast of Blue Ridge, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Suches, Amicalola Falls State Park, Margret, Camp Merrill, Fausett Lake, Dial, Springer Mountain Shelter, Len Foote Hike Inn, Cartecay, Pisgah, Black Gap Shelter, Stover Creek Shelter, Hawk Mountain Shelter, Porter Springs, Nimblewill, Roy, Gaddistown and Gooch Mountain Shelter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
